title: Woman in the Mists: The Story of Dian Fossey and the Mountain Gorillas of Africa
description: The greatest chronicler of man and nature gives us the first full-length portrait of Dian Fosseyâ€”the world-famous woman scientist and author of Gorillas in the Mist whose lonely crusade to save the mountain gorillas of Africa ended with her murder in December 1985. Two 8-page photo inserts.
author: Farley Mowat
